item.title: Weird bugs
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Ok so i’m making a minigame… and i get these weird bugs from it but idk why… Heres my code…

public boolean isInRcGame() { if((absX >= 3338 && absX <= 3389 && absY >= 9615 && absY <=9663)) setInterfaceWalkable(6673); sendFrame126(PlayerHandler.generalTimer+" secs", 6570); sendFrame126("RC Wars", 6572); if(PlayerHandler.generalTimer == 10) { toX = 3367+misc.random(3); toY = 9768+misc.random(3); heightLevel = 0; closeInterface(); resetWalkingQueue(); rcpoints = 0; sM("Thanks for playing RC Wars!"); sM("HighScores System coming soon!"); isInRcGame(); return true; } else { return false; } }

Thats that part… but it wasn’t working… so i put it as a boolean process then it just Teled like everyone from all over the world there… and it just was really bugged idk how to fix this?

Read full topic
